author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Highlight Communications Q1 EBIT Up 37.5 Pct At CHF 3.3 million
text:
May 25 (Reuters) - Highlight Communications AG:
* Q1 consolidated sales rose by CHF 5.5 million to CHF 85.5 million
* Q1 EBIT improved by 37.5% from CHF 2.4 million to CHF 3.3 million
* At CHF -0.3 million, the consolidated net profit for Q1 was down on the previous yearâ€™s period (CHF 0.8 million)
* Forecast confirmed for fiscal year 2018
